snippet: Several thousand people, mainly ethnic Albanians, protested Friday in Macedonia’s capital, Skopje, and other cities to demand a fair trial for five people suspected in the slayings of five fishermen.
lead_paragraph: Several thousand people, mainly ethnic Albanians, protested Friday in Macedonia’s capital, Skopje, and other cities to demand a fair trial for five people suspected in the slayings of five fishermen.

headline.main: Macedonia: Protesters Demand Fair Trial for Suspects
headline.print_headline: Macedonia: Protesters Demand Fair Trial for Suspects
